response.overview: In a chaotic, late-night London kebab shop, Li, an asian drag king, clashes with Hamza, a stubborn and traditional Turkish chef, over a simple request—sriracha on a kebab. The tension peaks when three drunk British lads stumble in, looking for trouble. The battle over sriracha quickly turns into a full-blown food fight - but it’s never just about the food. Through the chaos, Li and Hamza’s shared experience bridges the gap between them and reveals an unexpected friendship.
response.title: Sriracha
